article_metadata.author: John Zogby

og.description: A Zogby Analytics poll taken in the heart of a very good week for President Barack Obama shows him with a job approval of 46% and 52% disapproval. The online poll of 1,341 likely voters nationwide, conducted June 23-25, has a margin of sampling error of +/-2.7 percentage points. Two [...]
